fields.Title: VILLAGE / IDIOT DOOM SPIRAL
fields.Description: Idiot Doom Spiral Guy welcomes the return of Tequila Sunset! Tells the story of how you drove the car into the sea and drank with these drunks, and other tales of everything (in exchange of alcohol): cocaine skull, headless falnrider etc.

input
Hand/Eye Coordination: "My favourite was the gun he lost."
fields.Dialogue Text: My favourite was the gun he lost.

fields.Title: Empathy: "It's not meant as a joke. He's sorr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not meant as a joke. He's sorry for the Hermit Cop.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""God bless them, though. I'd be alo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "God bless them, though. I'd be alone without them. Anyway, that was all the story one bottle gets you." He turns his eyes to the bottle. "Almost empty this one..."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He says it like it's obviously your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He says it like it's obviously your name. Like you call someone Billy Brunuel or 'Leader of the Fourth Street Gang'.

fields.Dialogue Text: "Thanks, Rosie." He grabs the pen and paper and carefully, scribbles on the dotted line -- next to Lilienne's signature -- 'Idiot Doom Spiral'.

fields.Dialogue Text: It's an image of you that will stand the test of time. People will remember this for an age.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Fuck..." He lets his head drop bet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck..." He lets his head drop between his arms. "Well, that's that. At least I tried." A long and heavy breath out, a few sloppy sucks on his bottle.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Thanks for sticking with me. I'll..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thanks for sticking with me. I'll make sure I do better in the future." He exhales with huge relief. "Let me make it up to you. Anything I can do right now?"

fields.Title: You: ""Alright, give me your best pitch.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, give me your best pitch."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Remember when Maria Kapaleva cause..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Remember when Maria Kapaleva caused an uproar by walking the red carpet in those slippers -- the ones with the stick-on jiggly tits?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That was *me*. I did that." He loo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That was *me*. I did that." He looks up at the sky, victorious and content like an old cat. "We sold a lot of slippers that year..."

fields.Title: You: ""There's nothing more real than the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's nothing more real than the *End of Everything*."

fields.Title: Jump to: [application hub]
Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No need to worry about *that*," he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need to worry about *that*," he says, his inebriated mouth twisting into odd shapes, "I've got it *all* under control. Besides, it helps with my creativity. Gets the business juices flowing, y'know?" He finishes it off with a wink.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Relax*. I see you running around..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Relax*. I see you running around like a maniac, just back and forth, back and forth. Gotta live a little, enjoy the day."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Exactly! Just give me a minute or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Exactly! Just give me a minute or two..."
fields.Sequence: PlayAnimation(doomspiral, Doomspiral_up)@3; PlayAnimation(Tequila Sunset, Squat_down)@0.5; FadeToBlack()@10.5;

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yes, whenever you're ready -- and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, whenever you're ready -- and I don't think you ever will be..." He pauses to pick up his bottle.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Whoa! Rip you off? What is this, a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whoa! Rip you off? What is this, a radio novella on Channel 8? Friends don't let friends start ripping each other off! No, that's not how we operate here."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What would you like them to say?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What would you like them to say?"

fields.Title: Logic: "The strike might take forever... Ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The strike might take forever... Maybe you should just cut your losses while you can.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't spend a single brain cell wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't spend a single brain cell worrying about it, just leave it all to me... the final outcome will be *spectacular*. Just takes a little time..."

fields.Title: You: ""Now *that's* a story.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now *that's* a story."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I'd rather not get into the detail..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'd rather not get into the details. It was pretty low-concept."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes -- wanna tell me how you becam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- wanna tell me how you became Idiot Doom Spiral?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I rang my neighbours' buzzers. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I rang my neighbours' buzzers. It was late, and most of them didn't even answer. Those who did assumed I was trying to sell them something and hung up before I could even explain the situation..."

Inland Empire: "For some reason this *does* strike..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For some reason this *does* strike you as the most plausible theory of them all.

fields.Title: You: ""I got this special strike brew the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I got this special strike brew the Union uses." (Give it.)

fields.Title: You: ""Can you tell me about the Cocaine..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can you tell me about the Cocaine Skull again?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Right... a story specific to Marti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right... a story specific to Martinaise and its history." He takes a sip and gargles the drink to prepare.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Either way, it was a late Saturday..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Either way, it was a late Saturday night, when we, the Union of Moribund Alcoholics, got our drink on. Nothing remarkable about this, we get our drink on 24/7. Makes everything warm and glowy, I trust you know the feeling."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No, not really... you talked a lot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, not really... you talked a lot about some sad churches and how everyone's just out to fuck you."

fields.Title: You: ""Whoa.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whoa."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "That's right. Getting a good run in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's right. Getting a good run in's important to maintaining your physical *and* mental health.

fields.Title: You: ""I could probably use a good run my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I could probably use a good run myself."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I used to own my reality situation..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I used to own my reality situation. My business buddies and I had our own creative services agency. I had a nice apartment, an even nicer piece of ass, but somehow it all got away from me..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anyway, that's not the point. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anyway, that's not the point. The point is that mixing art and sex can make you fucking *rich*.
fields.Alternate1: "Anyway, that's not the point. The point is that mixing art and sex can make you fucking *rich*. Just don't go on a jog, unleashing a cascade of doom that washes it all away."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's because your paws are fucki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's because your paws are fucking filthy, Rosie! We're right next to the bay, you could wash them anytime."

fields.Dialogue Text: You hear the lieutenant suppress an almighty scoff.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Different *how*? Business is busin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Different *how*? Business is business. Doesn't matter if it's small or large, I handle it for you now -- that's what you hired me to do."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Now *me*, on the other hand? I onl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now *me*, on the other hand? I only provide *very* high-concept ideas. And as I already understand *your* needs I can marry them with your brand easily. I'll help you make your mark."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Listen, I'm not about to come betw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Listen, I'm not about to come between you two. I know my place, eh? I'll just be your Personal Brand Strategist man. Your high-concept idea generator. Yeah?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Alright, here we go -- Ms. Kapaleva..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Alright, here we go -- Ms. Kapaleva (née Olga Grebennikova) was once known as East Revachol's premier vedette and sex symbol. Her role in director Do Do Chakan's sexploitation motion picture 'Psychotronic Stripper' launched her into stardom. She's been voted Most Captivating Woman by La Fayette *three years* running.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Millions* of reál generated for c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Millions* of reál generated for clients. I've made my name in this world."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We really haven't got time for thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We really haven't got time for this," the lieutenant says, getting impatient. "In case you've forgotten, we're supposed to be investigating a murder."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No can do. Sorry." He stares at th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No can do. Sorry." He stares at the bottle in his hand, then lets out a deep sigh...

fields.Title: trust or not trust hub
Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Tequila... you know it isn't that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tequila... you know it isn't that easy yourself. I promise you I'm *working on it*." He winks, his fingers tightening around the bottle.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He turns his swollen nose to face t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He turns his swollen nose to face the moon, cheeks ruddy from the biting wind.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You too, Tequila Sunset!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You too, Tequila Sunset!"

fields.Title: Rosemary: "Before you can reply he's already f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Before you can reply he's already furiously scribbling something on the paper. When he hands the document back to you, the signature -- in upper case letters -- reads: "DON'T CALL ABIGAIL."

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call Abigail!" He snorts and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't call Abigail!" He snorts and takes a swig from his bottle. The bottle is empty.

fields.Title: Rosemary: ""Fuckin' 'ard work done for the day..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuckin' 'ard work done for the day, man."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't have any on me right now.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't have any on me right now."

fields.Title: You: ""No, this sounds scary." (Back up.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, this sounds scary." (Back up.)

fields.Title: idiot_teq_story_end_hub
Interfacing: "The muscles in your right leg tense..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The muscles in your right leg tense up.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, you said that you'd really b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, you said that you'd really behaved unreasonably and failed to uphold your responsibilities as a representative of the Coalition."

fields.Title: You: ""Did I say anything about the case?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did I say anything about the case?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Whoop-dee-doo. So now I'm a fuckin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whoop-dee-doo. So now I'm a fucking storyteller..." he says, slapping his knee. "Right. Why not? Better than a beach bum."

fields.Title: Rosemary: ""Hey, Spiral-Boy, you gonna share t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, Spiral-Boy, you gonna share that?" one of the other bums interjects.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So I removed the keyring and put t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I removed the keyring and put the keys for the front gate and the apartment into different pockets, to stop the jangling, you see. At least that was the plan..."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "He pinches his thigh as if to check..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He pinches his thigh as if to check whether this reality is *the reality*.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah. Maybe I've exaggerated certa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah. Maybe I've exaggerated certain parts over the years. When you tell a story too often, it begins to take on a life of its own..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What she doesn't know is that her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What she doesn't know is that her peace is about to be shattered. From behind her comes the clattering of hooves. Startled, she turns around, and what does she see?"

fields.Title: You: ""Have you got any more urban myths?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you got any more urban myths?"

Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Excuse me, are you telling the sto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excuse me, are you telling the story, now? No? You're not? Well then..." He scoffs.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The wind picks up, a sky already d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The wind picks up, a sky already dark now blackens. Water starts falling from above, the first cold rain of the season..."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Two women stand on a small outcropp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Two women stand on a small outcropping of rocks. One of them is wearing a purple raincoat. Thin lines reach out from the rods into the sea. Small droplets start appearing on the surface with increasing frequency.

fields.Title: You: ""Was she arrested?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was she arrested?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Maybe you're right, who knows? May..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe you're right, who knows? Maybe we were behind the curve? We were fucking *rich*, though, that much I know..."

fields.Title: You: ""I'll just admire it from afar, tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll just admire it from afar, thanks."

fields.Title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call Abigail! Don't call!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't call Abigail! Don't call!"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's the reality situation for y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's the reality situation for you. You think you got a handle on it, then *BLAM*! It throws some wild shit at you..." He takes a long swig, then smiles. "That's why it's critical to stay well hydrated."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Magic animals? No man, this is *se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Magic animals? No man, this is *serious stuff*..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You know, Tequila." He taps the si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, Tequila." He taps the side of his nose twice. "*Nose* candy. The white railroad. *Party powder*!"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Along with a number of more banal s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Along with a number of more banal street names: Blow, of course, but also flake, powder, pearl. Really anything that's white will work.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You've got to understand... the wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've got to understand... the work *this* guy was doing was *so* high-concept that regular amounts of cocaine just weren't cutting it. By the end they were bringing it in by the lorry load."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have to agree. We barely have wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have to agree. We barely have what we need to solve the case we've got now. We can't afford to run around chasing after quasi-mythical pieces of drug paraphernalia..."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Honest men on an honest quest. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Honest men on an honest quest. You should join them.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "As you've already determined, the a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you've already determined, the actual number is 216 -- but what's a little embellishment between friends?

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It's a big world out there, Tequil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a big world out there, Tequila. Lotta lost jackets in it. Don't know why you'd think this could possibly be mine..."

fields.Title: Rosemary: ""Hell yes!" The red-nosed drunk bri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hell yes!" The red-nosed drunk brings his hand up to his head for a salute.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anything else this merry band of a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anything else this merry band of adventurers can do for you, or do you need to go and mail that serious looking document of yours?" His face lightens up. "There's a mailbox on the plaza."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't know if I've mentioned it, b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't know if I've mentioned it, but I used to be a businessman and *as* a businessman I am going to keep the pen for my trouble." He nods confidently.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't know if I've mentioned it, b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't know if I've mentioned it, but I used to be a businessman and *as* a businessman I am going to keep the pen for my trouble." He nods confidently.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""At the Boom Boom Room I directed a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At the Boom Boom Room I directed a team of *talent architects*. People so high concept their names were nothing but a single letter. We had *manic* ideas, fuelled by copious amounts of coffee-flavoured whey powder. We did stuff no one had ever seen before -- or *since*!"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey, Tequila! Welcome to reality...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, Tequila! Welcome to reality. How's it treating you?" A thirty-something Lickra(TM)-clad man takes a sip from his beer.

fields.Title: You: ""No.""

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Maybe?" He takes a sip from his be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe?" He takes a sip from his beer. "You look like you want to know how Tequila Sunset came to be. You look like you want to hear *the tale*."

fields.Title: You: ""Go ahead.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Go ahead."

fields.Title: You: ""Uhm.. I want to get off this story..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhm.. I want to get off this story-train right now."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What train are you talking about?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What train are you talking about?" he asks, taking a sip of beer.

fields.Title: You: ""No train at all. Please continue.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No train at all. Please continue."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I think you said that *you* were t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think you said that *you* were the event, and that you would smash the looms of reality. Yeah... I knew I'd heard that looms line before."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, you kept talking about how t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, you kept talking about how the *coal mine owners* were fucking us all over just like that woman fucked you..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I was a once a reasonably high-net..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was a once a reasonably high-net-worth individual. A founder slash junior partner at a high-concept creative services agency. When my story begins, I had just landed a major contract with an insurance firm..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Well, yes, but it's the man *on* t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, yes, but it's the man *on* the horse that's of interest here. A man..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Gertrude Het may have been the fir..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gertrude Het may have been the first to witness the *Headless FALN Rider*, but she wasn't the last, oh no..."

fields.Title: You: ""I've got a hunch that it was the u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've got a hunch that it was the undercover cop. I'd want revenge, too."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Suit yourself, Mr. Sunset." He shr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Suit yourself, Mr. Sunset." He shrugs.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's what's so cool about advert..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Well, you know, sex sells. That's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, you know, sex sells. That's the first rule of advertising."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I *know*..." He takes a long, wist..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *know*..." He takes a long, wistful sip of his pilsner. "It was fucking awesome. And now it's all gone."
fields.Alternate1: "I *know*..." He takes a long, wistful sip of his beer. "It was fucking awesome. Until I went on a jog, unleashing a cascade of doom that washed it all away."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""That's rich coming from you, Tequi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's rich coming from you, Tequila. You had some pretty wild views about women last weekend..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, exactly. You're here to serv..."

fields.Dialogue Text: "Right on." He swigs his beer. "Have you made your mind up?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, they have," the lieutenant sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, they have," the lieutenant says, unamused.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The utter *genius* of its design --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The utter *genius* of its design -- conveyed beautifully through his commitment to a singular aesthetic. He's gone above and beyond!

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Let your Personal Brand Strategist..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let your Personal Brand Strategist handle the timing, alright? You just focus on telling me what you liked about my work up there."

fields.Title: praise hub
Idiot Doom Spiral: "It's Idiot Doom Spiral -- he's *bac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's Idiot Doom Spiral -- he's *back*. Like a beast made of jaundice and fetid polypropylene, he returns locked in stiff combat and with a most fearsome foe...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Three years, you hear that? Three y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Three years, you hear that? Three years... how hot did she have to be?!

fields.Title: You: ""What are you talking about? I'm th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you talking about? I'm the hottest shit in town. I'm as *real* as it gets."

fields.Title: You: ""To never even *grasp* the idea of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To never even *grasp* the idea of economic nonentities... I feel sorry for them."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Sorry about that, my friend. This..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry about that, my friend. This isn't about me, this is about *you*, of course. A chance for you to give back to the community. To get your brand out there. To teach them your *name*." He spreads his hands across the sky...

fields.Title: You: ""Here he is -- the man of the hour!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Here he is -- the man of the hour!"

fields.Title: You: ""That's it? It's just a bunch of sc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's it? It's just a bunch of scaffolding!"

fields.Title: You: ""It was extraordinary. Truly a feat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was extraordinary. Truly a feat of the century to get that scaffolding up so fast."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Listen, I know it might look a lit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Listen, I know it might look a little *lacking* right now, but you gotta trust the process. I've got it all under control. Once the strike is over, the workers will be all over the monument..."

fields.Title: Empathy: "*Papers*? Maybe she'll read the pap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Papers*? Maybe she'll read the papers and see your name... Maybe it will bring her back...

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I *guarantee* the papers will pick..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *guarantee* the papers will pick it up, with photos and everything. You'll be the talk of the town -- investing into the community, creating value, giving back..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey, guys -- we're heroes!" He wav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, guys -- we're heroes!" He waves his hand erratically to the other guys.

fields.Title: You: ""Are there any more stories you can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are there any more stories you can tell?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The tale I'm about to tell you is..."]

fields.Dialogue Text: "Did I tell you anything specific about this person that 'fucked me'?"

fields.Title: idiot_teq_story_1
Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It was a late Saturday night, when..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was a late Saturday night, when we, the Union of Moribund Alcoholics, were getting our drink on. Nothing remarkable about this, we get our drink on 24/7. Makes everything warm and glowy, I trust you know the feeling."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Your reality contracted -- you jam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Your reality contracted -- you jammed the pedal, ploughed right off the jetty and through the ice."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It seemed pretty painful, to be ho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It seemed pretty painful, to be honest with you. If I had to guess, I'd say you're still working through some shit."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""One day I left on my evening run...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One day I left on my evening run. As you may know, it's impossible to clear your head when you're distracted by the sound of keys jangling in your pockets." He shakes the bottle and makes a ringing sound.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The hobo lifestyle definitely has..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The hobo lifestyle definitely has some perks -- not having to pay rent, first and foremost. Not being responsible for twenty other people is nice too."

fields.Title: You: ""Look on the bright side -- you've..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look on the bright side -- you've got one hell of a story."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Our heroine finds herself enjoying..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Our heroine finds herself enjoying the peace and quiet the canal provides..." He looks up to the skies as if searching for peace himself...

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. Whatever became of the Headl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Whatever became of the Headless FALN Rider?" (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No one does it better than me, eh?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No one does it better than me, eh?" He claps his hands in delight. "I was able to get it all together -- and *so fast* too. No wonder I used to be an industry leader..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Here he is! The man, the reality,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Here he is! The man, the reality, the *financial czar*." He presents you to the group as if on a stage. "You seen it yet?"

fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking hell, Tequila. Don't do that to me. I appreciate being kept on my toes, but *man*!" He shakes his head to straighten himself out.

Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't know if I've mentioned it, b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't know if I've mentioned it, but I used to be a businessman and *as* a businessman I am going to keep the pen for my trouble." He nods confidently.

fields.Title: You: "“You mean *this* jacket that I disc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: “You mean *this* jacket that I discovered on the boardwalk and had cleaned on a whim?”

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He raises his palm as if to shun yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He raises his palm as if to shun you back to wherever you came from. "No-no-no, contrary to popular belief, I enjoy being alive."

fields.Dialogue Text: "So, uh -- can you tell me the Tequila Sunset story now?"

Inland Empire: "Good, these people know your *true*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good, these people know your *true* name. Looks like it has preceded you, Mr. Sunset. More on that later.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you for your services, gentl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for your services, gentlemen." He turns to you. "Should we go and mail this? I think I saw a mailbox on the plaza."

You: ""Yes, show them *real* art, then th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, show them *real* art, then they'll be able to appreciate the majesty of my finances."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, two secs." He slurps from hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, two secs." He slurps from his bottle then wipes droplets from his beard with a sleeve. Satisfied, his stomach sends a muted eruption to his throat, where it turns into a damp growl.

Rhetoric: "Picking the right praise to give is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Picking the right praise to give is just as important as picking the right critique. People shape themselves according to any and all feedback they get.

fields.Title: You: ""Your timing is awful! People died..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Your timing is awful! People died over there, then you go and do *that*."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""'Awful' is very strong, Tequila. Y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'Awful' is very strong, Tequila. You're gonna have to explain how I missed the mark by *so much* if that's the case. What don't you like about it?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Fuck yeah they will. Tequila Sunse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck yeah they will. Tequila Sunset is on the timeline. They'll be talking about you for years. The one and only."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Take it down? Is it really that ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Take it down? Is it really that bad?" He drags a hand down his face. "This is *fucking me up*, Tequila. I thought you'd love it -- honestly."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He freezes in his seat, motionless..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He freezes in his seat, motionless except his pupils, which quickly flick from side to side.

fields.Title: You: ""That's it, you're *hired*!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's it, you're *hired*!"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Tequila, Tequila... Whatever's goi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tequila, Tequila... Whatever's going on in my reality situation doesn't have any bearings on yours. This is all about *you* and *your* future. Ask me about *that*."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Nothing up front. That's 'cause I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing up front. That's 'cause I always put the client first. My cut'll come out of the back-end, *after* we've made you a sensation...."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I can already see it -- Tequila Su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can already see it -- Tequila Sunset -- spelled out in cathode rays. Luminous against the evening sky. There won't be a single kid in this town who doesn't know who you are."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Of course I am. When you're ready..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course I am. When you're ready -- and I don't think you ever will be..." He pauses to pick up his bottle.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Here's a man who knows how to play..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Here's a man who knows how to play the media -- by starting with the right question.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He turns his swollen face against t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He turns his swollen face against the wind, freezing rain battering his cheeks.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't think he can help, he's co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think he can help, he's completely out of it."

fields.Title: You: ""You've done a great service to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've done a great service to the village, to the RCM, and to Revachol.

fields.Title: Variable["village.idiot_gave_one_alcohol"]
Variable["village.idiot_gave_one_alcohol"]
!(Variable["village.idiot_gave_one_alcohol"])
Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, you seemed really mad about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, you seemed really mad about immigrants for some reason..." He rubs the back of his neck.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You kept calling yourself a 'godda..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You kept calling yourself a 'goddamn superstar' who'd cleared '501 cases'..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You said being a cop was real bori..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said being a cop was real boring and that there was no reason to talk about it." He shrugs.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So I made my way across the yard...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I made my way across the yard. Standing in front of my apartment door, fumbling with my pockets, I realized that I'd *also* forgotten my apartment key!"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""... with no head on his shoulders!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... with no head on his shoulders! Wearing a FALN tracksuit. Searching for the legendary FALN cap that went missing -- when he lost his head."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""If I hadn't lost my keys that one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If I hadn't lost my keys that one time, I'd agree with you. But... life is a cruel mistress..." He takes a sip.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "...is what you almost say, but the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...is what you almost say, but the words choke in your throat. Do you really want to miss out on all this good stuff? Perhaps it's *significant*.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, you look like someone with a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, you look like someone with a lot of cool stories. Wanna tell me how you even became Idiot Doom Spiral?"

fields.Title: You: ""Well, nice meeting you but I've go..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, nice meeting you but I've got to go." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Ouch, indeed. Reality was looking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ouch, indeed. Reality was looking rather grim, just then -- me lying on my ass in a mud pit in the middle of a heavy shower. But when life knocked me down, I always got up..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Wet*, okay? It was raining really..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Wet*, okay? It was raining really hard." There's a trace of derision in his voice.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmmm, this wouldn't be the Deponte..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmmm, this wouldn't be the Deponte-Delgado case, would it?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""When she sees something! Her shrie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When she sees something! Her shriek is so violent that the residents of the nearby apartment building believe lightning has struck..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But there is no lightning. Only a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But there is no lightning. Only a heavy downpour and the silhouette of the *Headless FALN Rider* looming on the horizon!"

fields.Title: You: "(Say nothing.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: (Say nothing.)

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Say, you're a detective, right?" H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Say, you're a detective, right?" He looks at you, bleary-eyed. "Maybe you can help ol' Doom Spiral out... solve the case of the missing jacket! What do you say, Tequila?"

fields.Title: Rosemary: ""'Ey! Tequila! You wanna buy some s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'Ey! Tequila! You wanna buy some speed?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""And yeah, you're already acquainte..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And yeah, you're already acquainted with Abs." He points to the man in the pipe. "So yeah, that's basically us. We drink together."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I don't remember you being such a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't remember you being such a dick before, Tequila..." He takes a slow, despondent sip from his bottle, then looks out across the bay toward the glittering lights of La Delta at night.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Well, at one point they came to me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, at one point they came to me, but you know, I didn't have any ID on me -- so they tossed me in jail for two days..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Do you always try to pick the lame..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you always try to pick the lamest option possible? Come on, Tequila!"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Some of those expeditions come bac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some of those expeditions come back after a week or so, looking haggard and dejected. Others don't return at all..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""The first time I saw one of these..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The first time I saw one of these expeditions, I thought they were fucking with me. There was no way it could be true. It was just *too high-concept*, even for me..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I'm not even sure I should be tell..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not even sure I should be telling you this story, to be perfectly honest. You're in a fragile state, and it might be too much for you to handle."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Apparently the idea was *too* high..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Apparently the idea was *too* high-concept even for this genius. He dropped dead right at his desk before he could finish. His last words are recorded to have been: "It's as white as a blizzard... *of cocaine!*"

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "He existed alright. You feel it dee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He existed alright. You feel it deep within your basal ganglia. He was as real as you are...

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Do you have anything to fortify ol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you have anything to fortify ol' Doom Spiral? Tell me you got some story juice."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "What are you talking about? Don't g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What are you talking about? Don't give up! Maybe there's another way... maybe up around the coast?

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What's that supposed to mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's that supposed to mean?"

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing." (Give him the jacket.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing." (Give him the jacket.)

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "As you've already determined, the a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you've already determined, the actual number is just over 200 -- but what's a little embellishment between friends?

fields.Title: Rosemary: ""Fuckin' cops, man, always hasslin'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuckin' cops, man, always hasslin' the poor folk." He shakes his head. "You know what? I'm keepin' the pen and that's the end of it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's an okay jacket." The lieutena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's an okay jacket." The lieutenant shrugs. "If you're into that look."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "My favourite is the gun."
fields.Dialogue Text: My favourite is the gun.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Oh yes, you do, *bratushka*. The on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yes, you do, *bratushka*. The only thing better than that is pushing the pedal to the metal after you kiss the tie. And off we go...

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Okay, what's on your mind?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, what's on your mind?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He scans the document and lets out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He scans the document and lets out a long, low whistle. "Things have really turned around for you, haven't they? You've got *big money* problems now." He looks back at you, eyes gleaming.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Alright, I understand. We'll do th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, I understand. We'll do this some other time, when you can focus on yourself and not this *inconvenience*."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You love it? Shit, Tequila, that's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You love it? Shit, Tequila, that's just made my day." His face lights up as his drinking buddy gives him a congratulatory pat on the back.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm amazed you were able to do it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm amazed you were able to do it so well and for so cheap."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Gimme more, gimme more. What do yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gimme more, gimme more. What do you like most about it?" He's giddy -- both from the drink and the anticipation.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Phew! Alright, you had me going th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Phew! Alright, you had me going there. I thought that was it for me -- back to rock bottom I go!" He lets out a nervous laugh.

fields.Title: You: ""The market moves fast and with ext..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The market moves fast and with extreme casualty."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "He better not let you down again. R..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He better not let you down again. Remember, this is *your* money and *your* reputation he's playing with.

fields.Title: You: ""Relevant experience?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Relevant experience?"

fields.Title: Endurance: "Grill him a bit, see how he perform..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Grill him a bit, see how he performs under pressure.

fields.Title: You: ""Like what -- any examples?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like what -- any examples?"

Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I didn't say renovating, I said *r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I didn't say renovating, I said *re-conceptualization*. It's medium-concept shit is what it is," he says, spitting out each word.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Hmm... the level of conceptualizati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hmm... the level of conceptualization *could* always be higher, yes.

Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Relax*. I see you both running ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Relax*. I see you both running around like maniacs, just back and forth, back and forth. Gotta live a little, enjoy the day."

Conceptualization: "What an athlete! There should be a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What an athlete! There should be a new word for drunk moves like that -- like alco-lete or gin-nast!

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No, you're right. I've *got* to do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, you're right. I've *got* to do this. I *need* this." He pushes a balled fist into a thigh. "Alright, you know what, Tequila, you old rat? I'll consider your request."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Listen, I can feel it in my guts -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Listen, I can feel it in my guts -- a bright future awaits you, the one and only *Tequila Sunset*! You're already building great brand equity. No doubt the profits will come rolling in shortly."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He turns his swollen nose to face t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He turns his swollen nose to face the sun, cheeks ruddy from the biting wind.

fields.Title: You: ""What do you guys do around here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you guys do around here?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hey Abs!" He shouts to the mumblin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey Abs!" He shouts to the mumbling drunkard next to him. "HEY ABS!"

fields.Title: You: ""Thanks.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thanks."

fields.Title: You: ""Have you seen a woman named Ruby a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you seen a woman named Ruby around here lately?"
fields.Alternate1: "Have you seen a red-haired woman named Ruby around here lately?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [idiot doom main hub]
Electrochemistry: "What else was there to do? Thank yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What else was there to do? Thank you brothers, for your helping hand.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""We asked about the whole Tequila S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We asked about the whole Tequila Sunset thing, and you told us it was your name now and insisted that we all call you that from then on."

fields.Title: You: ""How long did we party for?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How long did we party for?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wow. That's *quite* a story.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wow. That's *quite* a story."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You kept telling us that in your w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You kept telling us that in your work you've seen a lot of blood but that it's nothing compared to the 'Great Bloodletting' to come..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I used the profits from my agency..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I used the profits from my agency to finance what I called a 'cultural incubator' -- abstract value generation, value per person, high-concept stuff..."

fields.Title: You: ""You've got to be shitting me!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've got to be shitting me!"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anyway, long story short, life spi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anyway, long story short, life spiralled out of control. I haven't gotten into my apartment for years, and my girlfriend left me because she didn't want to date a homeless man. The company, well, you see where I'm going with this..."

fields.Title: You: ""Please, continue.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please, continue."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So what's happening?" He picks up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So what's happening?" He picks up his beer.
fields.Alternate1: "So what's happening?" He wipes his hand on his dirty Lickra pants and picks up his beer.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""When we finally got there you were..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When we finally got there you were sitting on the beach, crying. You said that your badge and uniform were in the car. It was too late to get in there though, the carriage had sunk too deep."

fields.Title: You: ""What did the case file say?" (Ask..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What did the case file say?" (Ask Kim.)

You: ""Man, mixing high and low, commodif..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Man, mixing high and low, commodifying culture, that is extremely my shit."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What? You never seen 100% Lickra(T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What? You never seen 100% Lickra(TM) before? Go on, feel that primo material." The man extends his arm...

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Well, Tequila, that's part of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, Tequila, that's part of the legend -- no one knows for sure. There are a couple of possibilities, though..."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, what kind of expeditions?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, what kind of expeditions?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You know, *obsessive* types. Peopl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, *obsessive* types. People with *predilections*..."

fields.Title: You: "What the fuck are you talking about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What the fuck are you talking about?

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Excellent." He rubs his hands toge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excellent." He rubs his hands together. "When can you get started? The sooner I get that jacket back, the sooner I can get my life back together."

fields.Title: You: ""I'll start right away.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll start right away."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you for your help." He turns..."

Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I don't think you're ready for tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think you're ready for that *grade* of reality yet. It'd be ill-advised for me to tell you. You gotta go do the *intro* yourself -- come back when you've been to the motor carriage, Tequila." He sips his beer.

fields.Title: You: ""Idiot Doom Spiral... I am ready no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Idiot Doom Spiral... I am ready now. I've seen it. Tell me the story of Tequila Sunset."

fields.Title: You: ""What happened?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened?"

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Nooooo! That was my favourite thing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nooooo! That was my favourite thing, of all the things you have.

fields.Title: You: ""So I checked out the horseback mon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I checked out the horseback monument..."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, I think you've done enou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, I think you've done enough for me. I no longer need you."

fields.Title: You: ""I do. I'm willing to give you anot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do. I'm willing to give you another chance."

fields.Title: You: ""Nope. I'm going to have to let you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nope. I'm going to have to let you go."

fields.Title: Composure: "You wince as your injured leg throb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You wince as your injured leg throbs with fresh pain. The drunk doesn't notice.

fields.Title: Volition: "Is he reading a book about his life..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is he reading a book about his life so far to figure out which reality he's in?

fields.Dialogue Text: You should hire him and ask him to stop drinking. Everyone deserves a second (or third) chance.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant massages his temples..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Relax*. I see you running around..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Relax*. I see you running around like a maniac, just back and forth, back and forth. Gotta live a little, enjoy the sun."

idiot doom main hub
Idiot Doom Spiral: ""So, have you got anything for good..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, have you got anything for good old Idiot Doom Spiral? A bottle for a story. Seems fair to me."

fields.Title: You: ""How do you know this?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do you know this?"

fields.Title: You: ""Naturally.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Naturally."

fields.Title: Authority: "You can't get off now."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can't get off now.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Anyway, there was a brief silence..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anyway, there was a brief silence -- a *gasp* of silence, if you will -- followed by a real commotion. We heard the carriage careening towards the coast at top speed."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Hours. It was an all-night drink-a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hours. It was an all-night drink-a-thon. Then at some point -- I think it was Sunday morning -- you got belligerent and wanted to talk about *Revacholian women*."

fields.Title: You: ""Are you sure it happened like that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you sure it happened like that?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""In retrospect, I guess you lost yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In retrospect, I guess you lost your motor carriage, too. That's a big one."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "So this is how being on the other s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So this is how being on the other side of the barrel feels.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Personally, I think he was just so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Personally, I think he was just some guy who hanged himself from a really tall tree and the fall was so violent that his head came clean off..."

fields.Title: You: ""Have you got any more stories?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you got any more stories?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""THE TIME HATH COME FOR TEQUILA SUN..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "THE TIME HATH COME FOR TEQUILA SUNSET. THE END OF ALL THINGS."

fields.Title: You: ""You seem like you're characterized..."

fields.Title: You: ""There's this black point in the wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's this black point in the world, a hole. It's already claimed an entire commercial area, maybe you're another one of its victims?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't need to hear any more." (C..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't need to hear any more." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Of course -- drink first, story la..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course -- drink first, story later." He holds out his palm.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, sure, I did that thing. What..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, sure, I did that thing. What of it?!"

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, Tequila?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, Tequila?"

fields.Title: You: ""Not too hot. I'm on a 50-year losi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not too hot. I'm on a 50-year losing streak."
fields.Alternate1: "Not too hot. I'm on a 42-year losing streak..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah -- looms. Why not? Then you j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- looms. Why not? Then you jammed the pedal and ploughed right off the jetty and through the ice."

fields.Title: Rosemary: ""Are you telling the story of the H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you telling the story of the Headless--"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""What? You know it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What? You know it?"

fields.Title: Logic: "If it sounds like it makes no sense..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If it sounds like it makes no sense, that's because it doesn't.

fields.Title: You: ""What was the name of your agency?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was the name of your agency?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""There was this designer, his exact..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was this designer, his exact name is lost to history, but in life he was a legend. Made it big in Oranje, where he did some real pioneering work on grotesque and sans-serif typography. A fucking genius, man..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "He takes a swig, wipes his mouth, t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He takes a swig, wipes his mouth, then continues. "That is, if he even existed. Who knows? It's an urban legend, after all..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Now, as you might imagine, snortin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now, as you might imagine, snorting that much cocaine can't be healthy for a regular human, right?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It's just not feasible within the..."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Yeah, well, that's the reality sit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, well, that's the reality situation for you. Who knows, though? Maybe someday we'll get our chance..."

fields.Dialogue Text: "The archaeologists say they want to put it in a museum. The gangsters say they want to sell it on the black market. And the ad agency guys say they're seeking inspiration..."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "This guy's your buddy-buddy. You fe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This guy's your buddy-buddy. You feel it immediately: you belong to an organization. A fraternity. Of *drunks*.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""*Other* things? We're talking abou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Other* things? We're talking about your big moment here, your time to shine, your ascension into a household name."

fields.Title: You: "(Applaud.) "I love it. Pure, naked..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Applaud.) "I love it. Pure, naked brilliance."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "It's bad PR and therefore bad for b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's bad PR and therefore bad for business. Tell him you don't want anything to do with it -- or him.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "What more could you want? He got yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What more could you want? He got your brand out there while giving back to the community. He hit the brief perfectly.

fields.Title: You: ""I've never seen marketing as inspi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've never seen marketing as inspired as that. It really is *high concept*!

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Let's just move on. Anything else..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's just move on. Anything else you want from me?"

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Tequila, Tequila... You don't know..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tequila, Tequila... You don't know what you're missing out on. Those other guys? They'll just steal your money while providing meagre service."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Sure, my man, let's circle back wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure, my man, let's circle back whenever you want." He hiccups. "Take your time. I'll be here."

fields.Title: You: ""Let's come back to this later.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's come back to this later."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""You see, net worth means *nothing*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You see, net worth means *nothing* to the people of Martinaise. Nada. Null. For them to see your wealth, to really *respect* that, you need to convert it into something real, something *tangible*. The bigger the better." He peers into his bottle for inspiration.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""And forget about contractors and t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And forget about contractors and the like. This job I'm handling *personally*, concept and execution," he continues. "Any unexpected expenses we'll take care of later. Can't let price compromise the work. Easy."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, let's do it, you're hired!"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, let's do it, you're hired!" (Accept his offer.)

fields.Title: You: ""Sure, sounds like a much-needed br..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure, sounds like a much-needed break from all the work."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""No, Tequila, let me take care of i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, Tequila, let me take care of it."

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""We are saving the world!" He looks..."
